hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Trail# is on the path to #the Key#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #a Wallet# can be found at #Zora's River#.
hinted_locations: ZR Near Open Grotto Freestanding PoH

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that ##the Market## has #1# major item.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that scoring 1500 in #horseback archery# grants #a Red Rupee#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #a Zora Scale#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Map of the Deku Tree#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that a school of #stingers swallowed by Jabu Jabu# guard #a Goron Tunic#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Purple Rupee# and #a Forest Temple Compass#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that plundering #the Lost Woods# is a foolish choice.

HC (Malon).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #Nayru's Love# and #a Red Rupee#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that plundering #inside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the path to #the Tower#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that shooting #the sun# grants #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that ##Dodongo's Cavern## has #2# major items.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: Have you ever tried hammering the ground or wall in a room with Torch Slugs, Flare Dancers, Tektites, Walltulas, Scrubs or Deku Babas?

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo Valley# is a foolish choice.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #a Bow# can be found in #the Death Mountain Crater#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that a #storm in the valley# reveals #2 Deku Scrubs#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Requiem of Spirit#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Slingshot# and #Saria's Song#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the path to #Morpha#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: I'm a helpful hint Gossip Stone!^See, I'm helping.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that inside the #Royal Family Tomb#, you will find...^ #Bombchus (10 pieces)# and #a Dodongo's Cavern Compass#.
